start.text: You are at a crossroad. Where do you want to go? Left or Right?

left_path.text: You come to a lake. Do you wait for a boat or swim across?

right_path.text: You encounter a tiger. Do you fight or run?

boat_wait.text: You waited for a boat and safely crossed the lake.

swim_across.text: You swam across but got tired and drowned.

fight_tiger.text: You fought the tiger and won!
